name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ アンジー
summary:
とある組織のボス邸に使用人として潜り込んだ
女スパイ「アンジー」。だが、正体がばれ、
彼女は囚われの身となってしまう。
--
Woman spy Angie was slipping into a certain house of gang's boss as a servant. However,true colors comes to light, and she in caught. To explore the whereabouts of her fellows, the gangs give the sweet torture on her luscious body. She gradually loses oneself,and...

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
